meanings.definition: The quality or state of being reputable.
meanings.sent1: Her reputabilities in the community were well-known and respected.
meanings.sent2: The company's reputabilities were tarnished after the scandal.
meanings.sent3: Despite his reputabilities, he still managed to surprise everyone with his actions.
meanings.sent4: The reputabilities of the brand shone brightly among its competitors.
meanings.sent5: The reputabilities of the school were upheld by its dedicated teachers and staff.

meanings.definition: The collective reputation or character of a person or organization.
meanings.sent1: Their reputabilities as a team were unmatched in the industry.
meanings.sent2: The reputabilities of the charity organization attracted many donors.
meanings.sent3: The reputabilities of the group made them the talk of the town.
meanings.sent4: She wore her reputabilities like a badge of honor.
meanings.sent5: The reputabilities of the restaurant spread far and wide, drawing in customers from all over.
